author: Oliviadaisy
title: Comfortable Stay
text:
Surprised at the negative reviews on here. The rooms are small and compact as it clearly states on there website; however for us this was only a place to sleep as we were busy all day and out for dinner every night. If you are tall ask for a room with larger bed - this is complementary on request. Hotel is really clean, modern and comfortable.
Great location 2 minute walk from Columbus Circle subway station. Walking distance to central park & times square etc.
We booked through secret escapes and got a very good deal - maybe I wouldn't of been so happy if I had spent more.
Room Tip: If you're tall you can request rooms with larger size beds See more room tips
